editionStmt.edition: Digitale Ausgabe von 〈Stele des Maati (New York MMA 14.2.7)〉 nach den Daten des TLA-Projekts

availability.licence: Metadata and texts are released as Creative Commons, Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 (CC BY-SA 4.0)

origDate.note: Laut Schenkel 1962 nach der 1. Zwischenzeit und schon in der 11. Dyn.; laut Schenkel 1965 in der Zeit des Antef Nacht-neb-tep-nefer; laut Fischer 1959 11. Dyn. vor der Wiedervereinigung; laut Winlock, 1943 wohl aus der Zeit des Nebhepetre; laut MMA-Website frühe Regierungszeit Montuhotep II. (d.h. Nebhepetre?)

origin.origPlace: Qurna et-Tarif; genauer Fundort unbekannt; laut MMA-Website: Purchased from Mohammed Mohassib in Luxor, 1914

ab.s: I was one beloved of his lord, his praised.
I was one beloved of his overseer, (i.e.) the royal chamberlain and overseer of the treasury Bebi.
He, however, is one who causes air to be breathed in every house.
An invocation offering to Ini the Great, whom Iku has born, so that he may give me offerings in the necropolis at the course of every day!
